list.item: Expression evaluation follow export rules, then it is not possible for now, to evaluate function exported to NONE for instance.

paragraph.paragraph: Limitations or known bugs for the .Net debugger:

list.item: when stepping through disabled assertions or disabled debug clauses, the debugger may show incorrect current line.
AppDomain debugging is not yet fully supported. When debugging 'AppDomain' related code, it may occur unexpected behavior (stepping or putting breakpoints).
In rare cases, EiffelStudio happens to stay blocked when launching dotnet system, and uses a lot of resources (mainly CPU). You will have to kill estudio processes and relaunch it.
